name: QuickCart
description:
QuickCart is a platform powering e-commerce and on-demand delivery for restaurants and stores.

We're currently one of the leading on-demand delivery platforms in Jamaica, with near-term plans to expand across the rest of the Caribbean and into Latin America.
one_liner:
QuickCart is a platform powering e-commerce and on-demand delivery for restaurants and stores.

We're currently one of the leading on-demand delivery platforms in Jamaica, with near-term plans to expand across the rest of the Caribbean and into Latin America.
